show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.

title: Connect The Dots
content: The Logic of Integrative Medicine: Listen to Victoria Maizes, MD, theExecutive Director, Arizona Center for Integrative... <!--more--> Medicine, andProfessor of Clinical Medicine, Family Medicine, and Public Health, and alsothe author of Be Fruitful: The Essential Guide to Maximizing Fertility andGiving Birth to a Healthy Child on Connect the Dots in conversation withAlison Rose Levy on Wednesday 10 AM ETÂ http://prn.fm/
